Posts.Content: Oh heck, hope it's not lymphodema don't want that as well! Hope the stuff from dr's works! r u on tamoxifen? if so we can compare side effects of that ha ha oh the joys of it!!!!   k xx
Posts.Title: Boob pain 1 year on.

Posts.Content: Hi, I had my lumpectomy around the same time as you, followed by chemo (3 fec, 3 taxotare) then radio which finished in november. I was fine with the radio, no burns but have started with the soreness too! i went back to the breast care nurses last week who thought it was still the after effects from radio. they gave me doublebase cream which is helping a bit, i was not happy when the soreness started i can tell you!!   k xx
Posts.Title: Boob pain 1 year on.

Posts.Content: yes very annoying! hope you can get it sorted soon   k x
Posts.Title: Boob pain 1 year on.

Posts.Content: thanks, will sleep a little easier tonight! xx
Posts.Title: tamoxifen and periods

Posts.Content: thanks for your reply's! I'll go to the dr's this week but feel a bit better now i know it can be common thanks again xx
Posts.Title: tamoxifen and periods

Posts.Content: Hi everyone,   Hope somebody can help put my mind at rest today? I'd be gratefull for all replys! I'm 41 finished chemo and radio since november and have been on tamoxifen since october, i'v had a little spotting before but now seem to be having a period, anyone else had them while on tamoxifen? thanks xx
Posts.Title: tamoxifen and periods

Posts.Content: Hi Everyone, I am looking for a bit of advice and any tips please. I found my lump 2 years ago in march 2011, i've had all the treatment and im now on tamoxifen and trying to get back to my'normal' life! My question is how does everyone cope emotionally with going for 6month check ups and yearly mammogram (my 6 mth check up is tomorrow) i am really apprehensive and nervous.Ive managed to not think about it and now it's looming over me!!
Posts.Title: check ups and mammograms

Posts.Content: Thanks, went today and was ok, just the waiting game now for the results! x
